docs.text: Conia Registry Note This library is under active development, some of the listed features are still experimental and subject to change. Large parts of the documentation are missing. A PSR-11 compatible dependency injection container Basic usage use Conia\Registry\Registry; class Value { public function get(): string { return 'string'; } } $registry = new Registry(); $registry->add(Value::class); $value = $registry->get(Value::class); assert($value instanceof Value); assert($value->get() === 'string');
docs.title: Introduction
